## If type

If for types.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type If<Condition, Case1, Case2> = IfExtends<
  [IsTruthy<Condition>, true],
  Case1,
  Case2
>
```
<b>References:</b> [IfExtends](./types-kit.ifextends.md)<!-- -->, [IsTruthy](./types-kit.istruthy.md)

## Example


```ts
 // Expect: 1
 type Foo = If<true, 1, 2>
```
